citation.title: CODATA Recommended Values of the Fundamental Physical Constants: 2022

files_downloaded.contains: Historical progression of CODATA recommended values showing uncertainty evolution

access_method: Extracted from NIST physics.nist.gov and PMC8290936
data_quality_notes: Official CODATA Task Group recommended values
The 2018 and 2022 values are based on 16 measurements with 3.9x expansion factor
Expansion factor applied because chi-squared test showed inconsistency between experiments
No new G measurements between 2018 and 2022 adjustments
